pages.title: Signal Tablet
pages.text: A handheld $(thing)signal diagnostic tool$() for debugging your train network. Shows real-time signal states, train positions, and track observer data in a portable display.$(br2)No peripheral API — this is a handheld item.
Hold in hand and right-click to open the diagnostic display.

pages.title: Using the Tablet
pages.text: $(bold)Features:$()$(br)$(li)View signal diagnostic data at a glance$(br)$(li)See which signals have issues or conflicts$(br)$(li)Identify problem areas in your rail network$(br)$(li)Portable — walk around and debug$(br2)The Signal Tablet uses a diagnostic-only scan of the train network, highlighting signal issues and conflicts. Unlike the Train Controller peripheral, it does not expose full train/station data — it focuses on signal health and troubleshooting.
